info.task: navigate to first cell of row in grid
info.title: Navigate to the first cell of a row in a grid

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFifthDataCell
setupScript.description: sets focus on the fifth cell of the second row in the grid

user: Navigate to the first cell of the current row in the grid.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the first cell of the current row in the grid.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Text of the column header ('Date') is conveyed
Text of the cell ('01-Jan-16') is conveyed
coordinates of the cell (column 1, row 2) are conveyed
